metadata.title: CVE-2015-2665 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - untriaged
metadata.description:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Cacti before 0.8.8d allowsremote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via unspecifiedvectors.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-2665` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

cacti - 0.8.8d+ds1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: cacti package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.8.8d+ds1-1').
